refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This element forms an IDREF link to a Footnote. It generates the same mark or link as the Footnote to which it points.
In technical documentation, FootnoteRef occurs most frequently in tables.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The FootnoteRef element usually generates the same mark as the Footnote to which it points, although its mark can be influenced by the Label attribute.

Neither SGML nor XML provide a mechnism (at this time) for asserting that some IDREF links must point to specific classes of elements. If a FootnoteRef points to something other than a Footnote, the parser will not report it as an error. It is an error nonetheless. Processing is undefined.
